channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Azure App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Azure App

item.title: CVE-2018-8600|2024-08-05T07:02:25.957Z -- microsoft -- azure%20app
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Azure App Services on Azure Stack does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka "Azure App Service Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability." This affects Azure App.
